message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a fantastic deal for both of us, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $900,000 is still quite a bit lower than what I need to make this deal work. I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This would allow me to make a reasonable profit while still offering you a great value for your investment. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $920,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me in the middle at $910,000?
